title: Periodic panic error during playback on cache
body:
This is the second time I've seen this and grabbed the debug.  I was playing a file via plex and it stopped partway though.  Tried to retry that one and another one and they both failed.  Here is the log from a playback.    Last time I had this happpen only fix was to tell rclone to rebuild the cache.  

```
2018/08/06 19:57:03 DEBUG : &{tv/Newhart/Season 01/Newhart - 01x08 - Some are Born Writers.Others Have Writers Thrust Upon Them DVD SPRiNTER.mkv (r)}: >Read: read=0, err=<nil>
2018/08/06 19:57:03 fuse: panic in handler for Read [ID=0xb7a805 Node=0x3d0a Uid=109 Gid=115 Pid=21143] 0xc 131072 @0x0 dir=false fl=0 lock=0 ffl=OpenReadOnly: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
goroutine 12381933 [running]:
github.com/ncw/rclone/vendor/bazil.org/fuse/fs.(*Server).serve.func2(0x11b5a80, 0xc4476c7490, 0xc44366def8, 0xc44366de6f)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/vendor/bazil.org/fuse/fs/serve.go:857 +0x1b1
panic(0xf19140, 0x17d3cd0)
        /home/travis/.gimme/versions/go1.10.1.linux.amd64/src/runtime/panic.go:502 +0x229
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache.(*plexConnector).authenticate(0xc4200e43f0, 0x0, 0x0)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache/plex.go:213 +0x639

        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache/handle.go:105 +0xdd
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache.NewObjectHandle(0xc44b8aef00, 0xc4204b61c0, 0x0)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache/handle.go:77 +0x151
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache.(*Object).Open(0xc44b8aef00, 0xc436f04ab0, 0x1, 0x1, 0x1, 0xc436f04ab0, 0x0, 0x1)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/cache/object.go:216 +0x67
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt.(*Object).Open.func1(0x0, 0x8008020, 0x18, 0x28, 0xc4618eed50, 0x0)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt/crypt.go:688 +0xf1
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt.(*cipher).newDecrypterSeek(0xc420354be0, 0xc4618eed50, 0x0, 0x8000000, 0xf88aa0, 0x1, 0xc4618eed50)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt/cipher.go:767 +0xd5
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt.(*cipher).DecryptDataSeek(0xc420354be0, 0xc4618eed50, 0x0, 0x8000000, 0xc421416800, 0xc42b62d220, 0x7f9eb55e91e8, 0x0)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt/cipher.go:1045 +0x4d
github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt.(*Object).Open(0xc42b62d220, 0xc436f04aa0, 0x1, 0x1, 0x0, 0x0, 0x2, 0x4100a9)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/backend/crypt/crypt.go:674 +0x350
github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/chunkedreader.(*ChunkedReader).openRange(0xc4207745a0, 0x10f79f8, 0xc4207745a0)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/chunkedreader/chunkedreader.go:220 +0x3aa

        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/fs/chunkedreader/chunkedreader.go:181 +0x89
github.com/ncw/rclone/vfs.(*ReadFileHandle).openPending(0xc491414cb0, 0xc4232938f0, 0x1)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/vfs/read.go:68 +0xf4
github.com/ncw/rclone/vfs.(*ReadFileHandle).readAt(0xc491414cb0, 0xc47a704000, 0x20000, 0x20000, 0x0, 0xe9a9c0, 0x1, 0xc47a704000)
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/vfs/read.go:199 +0x43

        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/vfs/read.go:194 +0xa1

created by github.com/ncw/rclone/vendor/bazil.org/fuse/fs.(*Server).Serve
        /home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/ncw/rclone/vendor/bazil.org/fuse/fs/serve.go:423 +0x331

2018/08/06 19:57:03 DEBUG : tv/Newhart/Season 01/Newhart - 01x08 - Some are Born Writers.Others Have Writers Thrust Upon Them DVD SPRiNTER.mkv: ChunkedReader.openRange at 0 length 134217728
```

```
root@voldemort:/home/bh# rclone -V
rclone v1.42-067-gffd11662Î²
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.10.1
```
